scripts.clean: echo ': Local environment:clean' && rm -rf ./node_modules ../api/node_modules ../view/node_modules && npm cache verify && docker system prune -f -a
scripts.init: echo ': Local environment:init' && [ -d ./node_modules ] && echo "Skip ..." || npm i
scripts.install:api: echo ':: Install api app' && [ -d ../api/node_modules ] && echo "Skip ..." || npm run install:api:exec
scripts.install:view: echo ':: Install view app' && [ -d ../view/node_modules ] && echo "Skip ..." || npm run install:view:exec
scripts.docker:list: echo ':: List docker containers' && docker ps | grep 'fb_' || echo 'No fb_ containers'
scripts.docker:start: echo ':: Generate and start docker containers' && export UID=$(id -u) && export GID=$(id -g) && docker-compose --compatibility up -d --force-recreate
scripts.mongodb:start: echo ':: Start local mongodb' && export UID=$(id -u) && export GID=$(id -g) && docker-compose --compatibility up -d --force-recreate mongodb
scripts.docker:stop: echo ':: Stop docker containers' && export UID=$(id -u) && export GID=$(id -g) && docker-compose down
scripts.start: npm run init && npm run install:api && npm run install:view && npm run docker:start && npm run docker:list && npm run end
scripts.stop: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:list && npm run end
